Mustex:  Like I said we go inside and talk.  We see if they want to 
work toward peace, or use allies to conquer Cybertron and then 
probably dispose of the allies.  If it's the latter we'll already be 
inside.  They're probably small right now too.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Thunderstorm: I hope you understand that this strategy is a 
> jeopardyzing one. We are, after all, a small group too. They can 
> easily slaughter us if they have any kind of base defense. If you 
> think we can get through this alive, then I'm with you.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Mustex: No but if they don't immediatly offer a treaty when we 
show 
> up 
> > we might as well count them as enemies and slag them while they're 
> > small.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Thunderstorm: What? They declared war already? Who the slag are 
> > they?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > Mustex: That's where you come in.  We blow them apart
> > > > and salvage their base circuit by circuit.
> > > > 
> > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Thunderstorm: No I didn't get it... and, frankly, I
> > > > > don't see how 
> > > > > useful it can be to have only cats in a group. They
> > > > > won't have the 
> > > > > forces needed to oppose airborne troops, let alone
> > > > > fight a bomber...
> > > > >

> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Mustex:  Yeh we figured we should blast that new
> > > > > cat faction.  Did 
> > > > > you 
> > > > > > get there message?  I doubt they would make an
> > > > > alliance with 
> > > > > > non-felines.
> > > > > >

> > > > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Thunderstorm had been scanning th whereabouts of
> > > > > the base, but 
> > > > > found 
> > > > > > > nothing of interest, so he came back.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Thunderstorm: Anything new, guys?
> > > > > > >

> > > > > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Mustex, Rhesus, and Mutate arrive at the base
> > > > > (mutate manages to

> > > > > Stallex tells them 
> > > > > > what 
> > > > > > > he 
> > > > > > > > was doing while they were gone.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex:  You get that message about the cat
> > > > > faction?
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Stallex: Yeh.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex: Wanna show em' who rules this planet.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Stallex: Thought you'd never ask.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Rhesus: Perhaps this is the time for diplo...
